<i>name</i><br><ol><li>July</li></ol>:
name
  1. God, the single deity of various monotheistic religions, especially the deity of Wakeffata, Judaism, Christianity, and Islam

noun
  1. The first letter of the Oromo alphabet, written in the Latin script.

character
  1. a the first letter of Kayan alphabet.

pron
  1. used for he, she, third person.

noun
  1. moan, painful voice of sharp pain.
  2. no..., don't
  3. butter (dialect case)

<i>name</i><br><ol><li>July</li></ol>:
noun
  1. (Afaan Oromo) painful voice of sharp pain.

noun
  1. duck
  2. which swims in water
  3. An aquatic bird of the family Anatidae, having a flat bill and webbed feet.
